snippet.title: Miasma Chronicles | Announcement Trailer (ESRB)
snippet.description:
#MiasmaChronicles

From the creators of Mutant Year Zero: Road to Eden comes a beautifully crafted tactical adventure you won’t forget! Embark on a quest across a post-apocalyptic wasteland torn apart by a savage force known only as the ‘Miasma’.

Wishlist Miasma Chronicles: https://505.games/MiasmaChronicles

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MiasmaChronicles
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/miasmachron/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/miasmachron
Discord: https://505.games/MiasmaChroniclesDiscord

Stay up to date with the latest news from 505 Games by following us across our community channels:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/505games
